data.title: My Friend Wilberforce by Helps Racey
data.meta_description: My Friend Wilberforce. Written And Illustrated By Racey Helps. A Barnaby Littlemouse Book. by Racey Helps and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.co.uk.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Good. No Jacket. First Edition. Hardback: full page colour illustrations by the author, colour pictorial covers are slightly rubbed on the edges, corners are bumped and worn, spine covering is missing, back cover is a bit dusty and is cracked, flyleaves darkened, name on the front flyleaf, inscription on the dedication page, internal foxing and a few other marks, lower page edges are finger creased, still g. obl 8vo, 47pp.

Hard. Condition: Good Minus. No Jacket. Helps, Racey (illustrator). Heavy chipping and rubbing to the spine with some loss to foot. Light chipping to the edges of the front and rear boards which are slightly bowed. Slight discolouration to the ffep. Foxing to closed edges and boards. Small owner name to verso of ffep. PP are very clean and bright and binding tight. Coloured illustrations still vibrant and colourful. Size: 16mo Landscape.

Hardcover. Condition: Poor. No Jacket. Racey Helps (illustrator). 1st Edition. The outer covering of the spine is present but away from one side, wear to the bottom; wear to corners and small chips to parts of edges. The main body of the boards is good. To the inside there is an inscription dated 1948 opposite the title page. The endoapers are illustrated and slightly tanned to page facing boards. The inside is very good with very lovely illustrations in colour which are given full page. A photograph would help with this description and will be sent on request. Broadleaf Books is a second hand independent bookshop in Abergavenny, South Wales. Enquiries and visits are very welcome.
